+ ## ğŸ“Š æ€§èƒ½ä¼˜åŒ–å»ºè®®

+ ## ğŸ“Œ ç‰ˆæœ¬æ§åˆ¶

+ import { ref } from 'vue'
+ 
+ export const useThemeStore = defineStore('theme', () => {
+   const currentTheme = ref(localStorage.getItem('theme') || 'rose')
+   const currentMode = ref(localStorage.getItem('mode') || 'light')
+ 
+   function setTheme(theme) {
+     currentTheme.value = theme
+     localStorage.setItem('theme', theme)
+   }
+ 
+   function toggleMode() {
+     currentMode.value = currentMode.value === 'light' ? 'dark' : 'light'
+     localStorage.setItem('mode', currentMode.value)
+   }
+ 
+   return {
+     currentTheme,
+     currentMode,
+     setTheme,
+     toggleMode
+   }
+ })

+     return Promise.reject(error)

+ )
+

```diff
+   const currentMode = ref(localStorage.getItem('mode') || 'light')
+ 
+   function setTheme(theme) {
+     currentTheme.value = theme
+     localStorage.setItem('theme', theme)
+   }
+ 
+   function toggleMode() {
+     currentMode.value = currentMode.value === 'light' ? 'dark' : 'light'

+   error => {
```

```diff
- 
+ import { defineStore } from 'pinia'
+ import { ref } from 'vue'
+ 
+ export const useThemeStore = defineStore('theme', () => {
+   const currentTheme = ref(localStorage.getItem('theme') || 'rose')
+   const currentMode = ref(localStorage.getItem('mode') || 'light')
+ 
+   function setTheme(theme) {
+     currentTheme.value = theme
+     localStorage.setItem('theme', theme)
+   }
+ 
+   function toggleMode() {
+     currentMode.value = currentMode.value === 'light' ? 'dark' : 'light'
+     localStorage.setItem('mode', currentMode.value)
+   }
+ 
+   return {
+     currentTheme,
+     currentMode,
+     setTheme,
+     toggleMode
+   }
+ })
+ 
```

```diff
+ })

+ // è¯·æ±‚æ‹¦æˆªå™¨
+ request.interceptors.request.use(
+   config => {
+     const token = localStorage.getItem('token')
+     if (token) {
+       config.headers['Authorization'] = `Bearer ${token}`
+     }
+     return config
+   },
+   error => {
+     return Promise.reject(error)
+   }
+ )
+ 
+ // å“åº”æ‹¦æˆªå™¨
+ request.interceptors.response.use(
+   response => {
+     const res = response.data
+     if (res.code !== 200) {
+       console.error('API Error:', res.message)
+       return Promise.reject(new Error(res.message || 'Error'))
+     }
+     return res
+   },
+   error => {
+     console.error('Network Error:', error)
+     return Promise.reject(error)
+   }
+ )
+ 
+ export default request
```

+ ç¤ºä¾‹: æ›´æ–°å°è¯´ç»Ÿè®¡
+ CREATE PROCEDURE sp_update_novel_stats(IN p_novel_id INT)
+ BEGIN
+   UPDATE novels n SET
+     n.views = (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM reading_history WHERE novel_id = p_novel_id),
+     n.likes = (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM user_likes WHERE novel_id = p_novel_id),
+     n.collections = (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM bookshelf WHERE novel_id = p_novel_id),
+     n.comments = (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM comments WHERE novel_id = p_novel_id),
+     n.rating = (SELECT AVG(rating) FROM comments WHERE novel_id = p_novel_id)
+   WHERE n.id = p_novel_id;
+ END;
+

+ #### ä»»åŠ¡5: æ•°æ®å¯¼å…¥å·¥å…· (8h)
+ ```python
+ æ–‡ä»¶: backend/tools/data_import.py
+ 
+ åŠŸèƒ½è¦æ±‚:
+ âœ… æ‰¹é‡å¯¼å…¥å°è¯´æ•°æ®
+ âœ… æ‰¹é‡å¯¼å…¥ç« èŠ‚æ•°æ®
+ âœ… Excel/CSVæ•°æ®å¯¼å…¥
+ âœ… æ•°æ®éªŒè¯
+ âœ… é”™è¯¯å¤„ç†
+ âœ… è¿›åº¦æ˜¾ç¤º
+ âœ… å›æ»šæœºåˆ¶

+ ç¤ºä¾‹ä»£ç :
+ import pandas as pd
+ import mysql.connector
+ from tqdm import tqdm
+ 
+ class DataImporter:
+     def __init__(self, db_config):
+         self.conn = mysql.connector.connect(**db_config)
+         self.cursor = self.conn.cursor()
+     
+     def import_novels(self, excel_file):
+         """å¯¼å…¥å°è¯´æ•°æ®"""
+         df = pd.read_excel(excel_file)
+         
+         # æ•°æ®éªŒè¯
+         self.validate_novels(df)
+         
+         # æ‰¹é‡æ’å…¥
+         for index, row in tqdm(df.iterrows()):
+             try:
+                 self.insert_novel(row)
+             except Exception as e:
+                 print(f"Error at row {index}: {e}")
+                 self.conn.rollback()
+                 raise
+         
+         self.conn.commit()
+     
+     def validate_novels(self, df):
+         """æ•°æ®éªŒè¯"""
+         required_columns = ['title', 'author', 'category_id']
+         for col in required_columns:
+             if col not in df.columns:
+                 raise ValueError(f"Missing column: {col}")
+     
+     def insert_novel(self, row):
+         """æ’å…¥å•æ¡æ•°æ®"""
+         sql = """
+         INSERT INTO novels 
+         (title, author, category_id, description, cover)
+         VALUES (%s, %s, %s, %s, %s)
+         """
+         self.cursor.execute(sql, (
+             row['title'],
+             row['author'],
+             row['category_id'],
+             row.get('description', ''),
+             row.get('cover', '')
+         ))
+ 
+ ä½¿ç”¨æ–¹æ³•:
+ python data_import.py --type novels --file novels.xlsx
+ python data_import.py --type chapters --file chapters.csv
+ ```

+ #### ä»»åŠ¡7: å›¾ç‰‡ä¸Šä¼ API (8h)

+ æ–‡ä»¶: backend/services/uploadService.js
+ 
+ åŠŸèƒ½è¦æ±‚:
+ âœ… å•å›¾ä¸Šä¼ 
+ âœ… å¤šå›¾ä¸Šä¼ 
+ âœ… å›¾ç‰‡å‹ç¼©
+ âœ… å›¾ç‰‡è£å‰ª
+ âœ… å›¾ç‰‡æ°´å°
+ âœ… æ ¼å¼è½¬æ¢ (WebP)
+ âœ… ä¸Šä¼ åˆ°OSS
+ âœ… CDNåŠ é€Ÿ
+ 
+ æŠ€æœ¯æ ˆ:
+ - multer (æ–‡ä»¶ä¸Šä¼ )
+ - sharp (å›¾ç‰‡å¤„ç†)
+ - ali-oss (é˜¿é‡Œäº‘OSS)
+ 
+ æ¥å£è®¾è®¡:
+ POST /api/upload/image
+ - maxSize: 5MB
+ - formats: jpg, png, gif, webp
+ - è¿”å›: url, thumbnail, size
+ 
+ å›¾ç‰‡å¤„ç†æµç¨‹:
+ 1. æ¥æ”¶æ–‡ä»¶
+ 2. æ ¼å¼éªŒè¯
+ 3. å¤§å°æ£€æŸ¥
+ 4. å‹ç¼©å¤„ç†
+ 5. ç”Ÿæˆç¼©ç•¥å›¾
+ 6. ä¸Šä¼ åˆ°OSS
+ 7. è¿”å›URL
+ 
+ æ€§èƒ½ä¼˜åŒ–:
+ - å¹¶å‘ä¸Šä¼ 
+ - è¿›åº¦å›è°ƒ
+ - æ–­ç‚¹ç»­ä¼ 
+ - åˆ†ç‰‡ä¸Šä¼  (å¤§æ–‡ä»¶)
+ 
+ ç¤ºä¾‹ä»£ç :
+ const sharp = require('sharp');
+ const OSS = require('ali-oss');
+ 
+ class UploadService {
+   async uploadImage(file, options = {}) {
+     // 1. å›¾ç‰‡å‹ç¼©
+     const compressed = await sharp(file.buffer)
+       .resize(1200, 1200, { 
+         fit: 'inside',
+         withoutEnlargement: true 
+       })
+       .webp({ quality: 85 })
+       .toBuffer();
+     
+     // 2. ç”Ÿæˆç¼©ç•¥å›¾
+     const thumbnail = await sharp(file.buffer)
+       .resize(300, 300, { fit: 'cover' })
+       .webp({ quality: 80 })
+       .toBuffer();
+     
+     // 3. ä¸Šä¼ åˆ°OSS
+     const ossClient = new OSS(ossConfig);
+     const fileName = `images/${Date.now()}_${file.originalname}`;
+     
+     await Promise.all([
+       ossClient.put(fileName, compressed),
+       ossClient.put(`${fileName}_thumb`, thumbnail)
+     ]);
+     
+     return {
+       url: ossClient.getObjectUrl(fileName),
+       thumbnail: ossClient.getObjectUrl(`${fileName}_thumb`),
+       size: compressed.length
+     };
+   }
+ }
+ ```
+ 
+ #### ä»»åŠ¡8: æ–‡ä»¶ç®¡ç†ç³»ç»Ÿ (8h)

+ // æ·»åŠ ä»»åŠ¡
+ emailQueue.add('send-email', {
+   to: 'user@example.com',
+   template: 'welcome',
+   data: { username: 'user001' }
+ }, {
+   attempts: 3,
+   backoff: {
+     type: 'exponential',
+     delay: 2000
+   },
+   priority: 1
+ });
+ 
+ // å¤„ç†ä»»åŠ¡
+ emailQueue.process('send-email', async (job) => {
+   const { to, template, data } = job.data;
+   await sendEmail(to, template, data);
+ });
+ 
+ // å¤±è´¥å¤„ç†
+ emailQueue.on('failed', (job, err) => {
+   console.error(`Job ${job.id} failed:`, err);
+   // è®°å½•æ—¥å¿—
+   // å‘é€å‘Šè­¦
+ });
+ 
+ // ç›‘æ§
+ emailQueue.on('completed', (job) => {
+   console.log(`Job ${job.id} completed`);
+ });
+ ```

+ #### ä»»åŠ¡11: å®šæ—¶ä»»åŠ¡ (8h)

+ æ–‡ä»¶: backend/jobs/scheduledJobs.js

+ å®šæ—¶ä»»åŠ¡åˆ—è¡¨:
+ âœ… æ¯å°æ—¶: æ›´æ–°ç»Ÿè®¡æ•°æ®
+ âœ… æ¯å¤©å‡Œæ™¨: ç”Ÿæˆç»Ÿè®¡æŠ¥è¡¨
+ âœ… æ¯å¤©å‡Œæ™¨: æ•°æ®åº“å¤‡ä»½

+ ## ğŸ“‹ ç¬¬ä¸‰å‘¨ä»»åŠ¡ (40å°æ—¶) - æ€§èƒ½ä¼˜åŒ–ä¸ç›‘æ§

+ ### Day 1-2: Redisç¼“å­˜ä¼˜åŒ– (16h)
+ 
+ #### ä»»åŠ¡12: ç¼“å­˜æ¶æ„è®¾è®¡ (8h)
+ ```javascript
+ æ–‡ä»¶: backend/cache/cacheManager.js
+ 
+ ç¼“å­˜ç­–ç•¥:
+ âœ… å¤šçº§ç¼“å­˜ (æœ¬åœ° + Redis)
+ âœ… ç¼“å­˜é¢„çƒ­
+ âœ… ç¼“å­˜æ›´æ–°ç­–ç•¥
+ âœ… ç¼“å­˜ç©¿é€é˜²æŠ¤
+ âœ… ç¼“å­˜é›ªå´©é˜²æŠ¤
+ âœ… ç¼“å­˜å‡»ç©¿é˜²æŠ¤
+ 
+ ç¼“å­˜å±‚çº§:
+ 1. L1: æœ¬åœ°å†…å­˜ç¼“å­˜ (LRU)
+    - çƒ­ç‚¹æ•°æ®
+    - 1åˆ†é’Ÿè¿‡æœŸ
+ 
+ 2. L2: Redisç¼“å­˜
+    - å¸¸ç”¨æ•°æ®
+    - æŒ‰ç±»å‹è®¾ç½®TTL
+ 
+ 3. L3: æ•°æ®åº“
+ 
+ ç¼“å­˜KEYè®¾è®¡:
+ - novel:list:{category}:{page}
+ - novel:detail:{id}
+ - chapter:content:{id}
+ - user:info:{id}
+ - hot:rank:{type}
+ 
+ ç¤ºä¾‹ä»£ç :
+ const LRU = require('lru-cache');
+ const Redis = require('ioredis');
+ 
+ class CacheManager {
+   constructor() {
+     // L1ç¼“å­˜
+     this.l1Cache = new LRU({
+       max: 500,
+       ttl: 1000 * 60, // 1åˆ†é’Ÿ
+       updateAgeOnGet: true
+     });
+     
+     // L2ç¼“å­˜
+     this.redis = new Redis(redisConfig);
+   }
+   
+   async get(key) {
+     // 1. å°è¯•L1ç¼“å­˜
+     let value = this.l1Cache.get(key);
+     if (value) return value;
+     
+     // 2. å°è¯•Redis
+     value = await this.redis.get(key);
+     if (value) {
+       value = JSON.parse(value);
+       this.l1Cache.set(key, value);
+       return value;
+     }
+     
+     return null;
+   }
+   
+   async set(key, value, ttl = 3600) {
+     // 1. è®¾ç½®L1ç¼“å­˜
+     this.l1Cache.set(key, value);
+     
+     // 2. è®¾ç½®Redis
+     await this.redis.setex(
+       key,
+       ttl,
+       JSON.stringify(value)
+     );
+   }
+   
+   async getOrSet(key, fetchFunc, ttl = 3600) {
+     let value = await this.get(key);
+     
+     if (value === null) {
+       value = await fetchFunc();
+       if (value) {
+         await this.set(key, value, ttl);
+       }
+     }
+     
+     return value;
+   }
+   
+   async delete(key) {
+     this.l1Cache.delete(key);
+     await this.redis.del(key);
+   }
+   
+   // æ‰¹é‡åˆ é™¤ (æ¨¡å¼åŒ¹é…)
+   async deletePattern(pattern) {
+     const keys = await this.redis.keys(pattern);
+     if (keys.length > 0) {
+       await this.redis.del(...keys);
+     }
+   }
+ }
+ 
+ // ä½¿ç”¨ç¤ºä¾‹
+ const cache = new CacheManager();
+ 
+ // è·å–å°è¯´è¯¦æƒ… (å¸¦ç¼“å­˜)
+ async function getNovelDetail(id) {
+   return await cache.getOrSet(
+     `novel:detail:${id}`,
+     async () => {
+       return await db.query('SELECT * FROM novels WHERE id = ?', [id]);
+     },
+     3600 // 1å°æ—¶
+   );
+ }
+ ```
+ 
+ #### ä»»åŠ¡13: ç¼“å­˜é¢„çƒ­ä¸æ›´æ–° (8h)
+ ```javascript
+ æ–‡ä»¶: backend/cache/cacheWarmer.js
+ 
+ é¢„çƒ­ç­–ç•¥:
+ âœ… å¯åŠ¨æ—¶é¢„çƒ­çƒ­é—¨æ•°æ®
+ âœ… å®šæ—¶åˆ·æ–°ç¼“å­˜
+ âœ… ä¸»åŠ¨æ›´æ–°æœºåˆ¶
+ âœ… å»¶è¿ŸåŒåˆ ç­–ç•¥
+ 
+ é¢„çƒ­å†…å®¹:
+ - çƒ­é—¨å°è¯´åˆ—è¡¨
+ - çƒ­é—¨æœç´¢
+ - åˆ†ç±»åˆ—è¡¨
+ - ç³»ç»Ÿé…ç½®
+ 
+ ç¤ºä¾‹ä»£ç :
+ class CacheWarmer {
+   async warmup() {
+     console.log('å¼€å§‹ç¼“å­˜é¢„çƒ­...');
+     
+     await Promise.all([
+       this.warmupHotNovels(),
+       this.warmupCategories(),
+       this.warmupHotSearch(),
+       this.warmupSystemConfig()
+     ]);
+     
+     console.log('ç¼“å­˜é¢„çƒ­å®Œæˆ');
+   }
+   
+   async warmupHotNovels() {
+     // é¢„çƒ­å„åˆ†ç±»TOP100å°è¯´
+     const categories = await db.query('SELECT id FROM categories');
+     
+     for (const cat of categories) {
+       const novels = await db.query(`
+         SELECT * FROM novels
+         WHERE category_id = ?
+         ORDER BY views DESC
+         LIMIT 100
+       `, [cat.id]);
+       
+       await cache.set(
+         `novels:hot:${cat.id}`,
+         novels,
+         86400 // 24å°æ—¶
+       );
+     }
+   }
+   
+   // å»¶è¿ŸåŒåˆ 
+   async updateNovel(id, data) {
+     // 1. å…ˆåˆ é™¤ç¼“å­˜
+     await cache.delete(`novel:detail:${id}`);
+     
+     // 2. æ›´æ–°æ•°æ®åº“
+     await db.query('UPDATE novels SET ? WHERE id = ?', [data, id]);
+     
+     // 3. å»¶è¿Ÿåå†åˆ é™¤ä¸€æ¬¡ (é˜²æ­¢è„è¯»)
+     setTimeout(async () => {
+       await cache.delete(`novel:detail:${id}`);
+     }, 1000);
+   }
+ }
+ ```

+ ### Day 3: æ•°æ®åº“è¿æ¥æ± ä¼˜åŒ– (8h)
+ 
+ #### ä»»åŠ¡14: è¿æ¥æ± é…ç½® (8h)
+ ```javascript
+ æ–‡ä»¶: backend/database/pool.js
+ 
+ ä¼˜åŒ–å†…å®¹:
+ âœ… è¿æ¥æ± é…ç½®ä¼˜åŒ–
+ âœ… è¯»å†™åˆ†ç¦»
+ âœ… è¿æ¥æ± ç›‘æ§
+ âœ… è¿æ¥æ³„æ¼æ£€æµ‹
+ âœ… æ•…éšœè½¬ç§»
+ 
+ è¿æ¥æ± é…ç½®:
+ const mysql = require('mysql2/promise');
+ 
+ // ä¸»åº“è¿æ¥æ± 
+ const masterPool = mysql.createPool({
+   host: 'master.db.com',
+   port: 3306,
+   user: 'root',
+   password: 'password',
+   database: 'ai_xsread',
+   connectionLimit: 50,      // æœ€å¤§è¿æ¥æ•°
+   queueLimit: 0,            // é˜Ÿåˆ—é™åˆ¶
+   waitForConnections: true,
+   acquireTimeout: 30000,    // è·å–è¿æ¥è¶…æ—¶
+   timeout: 60000,           // æŸ¥è¯¢è¶…æ—¶
+   enableKeepAlive: true,
+   keepAliveInitialDelay: 0
+ });
+ 
+ // ä»åº“è¿æ¥æ± 
+ const slavePool = mysql.createPool({
+   host: 'slave.db.com',
+   port: 3306,
+   user: 'readonly',
+   password: 'password',
+   database: 'ai_xsread',
+   connectionLimit: 100,
+   // ... å…¶ä»–é…ç½®
+ });
+ 
+ // è¿æ¥æ± ç®¡ç†å™¨
+ class DatabaseManager {
+   constructor() {
+     this.master = masterPool;
+     this.slaves = [slavePool];
+     this.currentSlave = 0;
+   }
+   
+   // å†™æ“ä½œä½¿ç”¨ä¸»åº“
+   async write(sql, params) {
+     const conn = await this.master.getConnection();
+     try {
+       const [rows] = await conn.execute(sql, params);
+       return rows;
+     } finally {
+       conn.release();
+     }
+   }
+   
+   // è¯»æ“ä½œä½¿ç”¨ä»åº“ (è½®è¯¢)
+   async read(sql, params) {
+     const pool = this.getSlavePool();
+     const conn = await pool.getConnection();
+     try {
+       const [rows] = await conn.execute(sql, params);
+       return rows;
+     } finally {
+       conn.release();
+     }
+   }
+   
+   getSlavePool() {
+     const pool = this.slaves[this.currentSlave];
+     this.currentSlave = (this.currentSlave + 1) % this.slaves.length;
+     return pool;
+   }
+   
+   // ç›‘æ§è¿æ¥æ± 
+   getPoolStats() {
+     return {
+       master: {
+         total: this.master.pool._allConnections.length,
+         active: this.master.pool._allConnections.length - 
+                 this.master.pool._freeConnections.length,
+         idle: this.master.pool._freeConnections.length
+       },
+       slave: this.slaves.map(pool => ({
+         total: pool.pool._allConnections.length,
+         active: pool.pool._allConnections.length - 
+                 pool.pool._freeConnections.length,
+         idle: pool.pool._freeConnections.length
+       }))
+     };
+   }
+ }
+ 
+ // å®šæ—¶ç›‘æ§
+ setInterval(() => {
+   const stats = db.getPoolStats();
+   console.log('è¿æ¥æ± çŠ¶æ€:', stats);
+   
+   // å‘Šè­¦
+   if (stats.master.active > 40) {
+     console.warn('ä¸»åº“è¿æ¥æ± ä½¿ç”¨ç‡è¿‡é«˜!');
+   }
+ }, 60000);
+ ```
+ 
+ ### Day 4-5: ç›‘æ§ä¸å‘Šè­¦ (16h)
+ 
+ #### ä»»åŠ¡15: æ€§èƒ½ç›‘æ§ç³»ç»Ÿ (8h)
+ ```javascript
+ æ–‡ä»¶: backend/monitor/performanceMonitor.js
+ 
+ ç›‘æ§æŒ‡æ ‡:
+ âœ… APIå“åº”æ—¶é—´
+ âœ… æ•°æ®åº“æŸ¥è¯¢æ—¶é—´
+ âœ… ç¼“å­˜å‘½ä¸­ç‡
+ âœ… é”™è¯¯ç‡
+ âœ… å¹¶å‘æ•°
+ âœ… å†…å­˜ä½¿ç”¨
+ âœ… CPUä½¿ç”¨
+ âœ… ç£ç›˜IO
+ 
+ ç›‘æ§å·¥å…·:
+ - PM2 (è¿›ç¨‹ç›‘æ§)
+ - Prometheus (æŒ‡æ ‡é‡‡é›†)
+ - Grafana (å¯è§†åŒ–)
+ - Sentry (é”™è¯¯è¿½è¸ª)
+ 
+ ç¤ºä¾‹ä»£ç :
+ const prometheus = require('prom-client');
+ 
+ // åˆ›å»ºæŒ‡æ ‡
+ const httpRequestDuration = new prometheus.Histogram({
+   name: 'http_request_duration_ms',
+   help: 'HTTPè¯·æ±‚è€—æ—¶',
+   labelNames: ['method', 'route', 'status']
+ });
+ 
+ const dbQueryDuration = new prometheus.Histogram({
+   name: 'db_query_duration_ms',
+   help: 'æ•°æ®åº“æŸ¥è¯¢è€—æ—¶',
+   labelNames: ['query_type']
+ });
+ 
+ const cacheHitRate = new prometheus.Gauge({
+   name: 'cache_hit_rate',
+   help: 'ç¼“å­˜å‘½ä¸­ç‡',
+   labelNames: ['cache_type']
+ });
+ 
+ // APIç›‘æ§ä¸­é—´ä»¶
+ function monitorMiddleware(req, res, next) {
+   const start = Date.now();
+   
+   res.on('finish', () => {
+     const duration = Date.now() - start;
+     httpRequestDuration
+       .labels(req.method, req.route.path, res.statusCode)
+       .observe(duration);
+   });
+   
+   next();
+ }
+ 
+ // æ•°æ®åº“ç›‘æ§
+ async function monitoredQuery(sql, params) {
+   const start = Date.now();
+   const queryType = sql.trim().split(' ')[0].toLowerCase();
+   
+   try {
+     const result = await db.query(sql, params);
+     const duration = Date.now() - start;
+     
+     dbQueryDuration
+       .labels(queryType)
+       .observe(duration);
+     
+     return result;
+   } catch (error) {
+     errorCounter.inc({ type: 'database' });
+     throw error;
+   }
+ }
+ 
+ // å®šæ—¶ç»Ÿè®¡ç¼“å­˜å‘½ä¸­ç‡
+ setInterval(async () => {
+   const stats = await cache.getStats();
+   cacheHitRate
+     .labels('l1')
+     .set(stats.l1.hitRate);
+   cacheHitRate
+     .labels('l2')
+     .set(stats.l2.hitRate);
+ }, 60000);
+ 
+ // æš´éœ²æŒ‡æ ‡
+ app.get('/metrics', async (req, res) => {
+   res.set('Content-Type', prometheus.register.contentType);
+   res.end(await prometheus.register.metrics());
+ });
+ ```
+ 
+ #### ä»»åŠ¡16: å‘Šè­¦ç³»ç»Ÿ (8h)
+ ```javascript
+ æ–‡ä»¶: backend/monitor/alerting.js
+ 
+ å‘Šè­¦è§„åˆ™:
+ âœ… APIå“åº”æ—¶é—´ > 1s
+ âœ… é”™è¯¯ç‡ > 5%
+ âœ… æ•°æ®åº“è¿æ¥æ± ä½¿ç”¨ç‡ > 80%
+ âœ… ç¼“å­˜å‘½ä¸­ç‡ < 70%
+ âœ… ç£ç›˜ä½¿ç”¨ç‡ > 85%
+ âœ… å†…å­˜ä½¿ç”¨ç‡ > 90%
+ 
+ å‘Šè­¦æ¸ é“:
+ - é’‰é’‰æœºå™¨äºº
+ - é‚®ä»¶
+ - çŸ­ä¿¡ (ç´§æ€¥)
+ 
+ ç¤ºä¾‹ä»£ç :
+ class AlertManager {
+   constructor() {
+     this.rules = [];
+     this.cooldown = new Map(); // é˜²æ­¢å‘Šè­¦é£æš´
+   }
+   
+   addRule(rule) {
+     this.rules.push(rule);
+   }
+   
+   async check() {
+     for (const rule of this.rules) {
+       const value = await rule.getValue();
+       
+       if (rule.condition(value)) {
+         await this.alert(rule, value);
+       }
+     }
+   }
+   
+   async alert(rule, value) {
+     const key = rule.name;
+     
+     // å†·å´æœŸæ£€æŸ¥ (5åˆ†é’Ÿå†…ä¸é‡å¤å‘Šè­¦)
+     if (this.cooldown.has(key)) {
+       const lastAlert = this.cooldown.get(key);
+       if (Date.now() - lastAlert < 5 * 60 * 1000) {
+         return;
+       }
+     }
+     
+     // å‘é€å‘Šè­¦
+     await this.sendDingTalk({
+       title: `âš ï¸ ${rule.name}`,
+       text: `å½“å‰å€¼: ${value}\né˜ˆå€¼: ${rule.threshold}\næ—¶é—´: ${new Date().toLocaleString()}`
+     });
+     
+     this.cooldown.set(key, Date.now());
+   }
+   
+   async sendDingTalk(message) {
+     // é’‰é’‰æœºå™¨äººwebhook
+     await axios.post(dingTalkWebhook, {
+       msgtype: 'markdown',
+       markdown: {
+         title: message.title,
+         text: message.text
+       }
+     });
+   }
+ }
+ 
+ // é…ç½®å‘Šè­¦è§„åˆ™
+ const alertManager = new AlertManager();
+ 
+ alertManager.addRule({
+   name: 'APIå“åº”æ—¶é—´è¿‡é•¿',
+   getValue: async () => {
+     const stats = await getApiStats();
+     return stats.avgDuration;
+   },
+   condition: (value) => value > 1000,
+   threshold: '1000ms',
+   level: 'warning'
+ });
+ 
+ alertManager.addRule({
+   name: 'æ•°æ®åº“è¿æ¥æ± å‘Šè­¦',
+   getValue: async () => {
+     const stats = db.getPoolStats();
+     return stats.master.active / stats.master.total;
+   },
+   condition: (value) => value > 0.8,
+   threshold: '80%',
+   level: 'critical'
+ });
+ 
+ // æ¯åˆ†é’Ÿæ£€æŸ¥ä¸€æ¬¡
+ setInterval(() => {
+   alertManager.check();
+ }, 60000);
+ ```
+ 
+ ---
+ 
+ ## ğŸ“‹ ç¬¬å››å‘¨ä»»åŠ¡ (40å°æ—¶) - éƒ¨ç½²ä¸è¿ç»´
+ 
+ ### Day 1-2: Dockerå®¹å™¨åŒ– (16h)
+ 
+ #### ä»»åŠ¡17: Dockeré…ç½® (8h)
+ ```dockerfile
+ æ–‡ä»¶: Dockerfile

+ ```yaml

+   # Node.jsåº”ç”¨

+     build: .

+       - "8000:8000"

+       - DB_HOST=mysql

+ ```
+ 
+ #### ä»»åŠ¡18: Nginxé…ç½® (8h)
+ ```nginx
+ æ–‡ä»¶: nginx.conf
+ 
+ user nginx;
+ worker_processes auto;
+ error_log /var/log/nginx/error.log warn;
+ pid /var/run/nginx.pid;
+ 
+ events {
+     worker_connections 2048;
+     use epoll;
+ }
+ 
+ http {
+     include /etc/nginx/mime.types;
+     default_type application/octet-stream;
+ 
+     # æ—¥å¿—æ ¼å¼
+     log_format main '$remote_addr - $remote_user [$time_local] "$request" '
+                     '$status $body_bytes_sent "$http_referer" '
+                     '"$http_user_agent" $request_time';
+ 
+     access_log /var/log/nginx/access.log main;
+ 
+     sendfile on;
+     tcp_nopush on;
+     tcp_nodelay on;
+     keepalive_timeout 65;
+     types_hash_max_size 2048;
+     client_max_body_size 50M;
+ 
+     # Gzipå‹ç¼©
+     gzip on;
+     gzip_vary on;
+     gzip_proxied any;
+     gzip_comp_level 6;
+     gzip_types text/plain text/css text/xml text/javascript 
+                application/json application/javascript application/xml+rss;
+ 
+     # é™æµé…ç½®
+     limit_req_zone $binary_remote_addr zone=api:10m rate=100r/s;
+     limit_conn_zone $binary_remote_addr zone=addr:10m;
+ 
+     # åç«¯æœåŠ¡å™¨
+     upstream backend {
+         server api:8000 weight=1 max_fails=3 fail_timeout=30s;
+         keepalive 32;
+     }
+ 
+     # HTTPé‡å®šå‘åˆ°HTTPS
+     server {
+         listen 80;
+         server_name yourdomain.com;
+         return 301 https://$server_name$request_uri;
+     }
+ 
+     # HTTPSæœåŠ¡å™¨
+     server {
+         listen 443 ssl http2;
+         server_name yourdomain.com;
+ 
+         # SSLè¯ä¹¦
+         ssl_certificate /etc/nginx/ssl/cert.pem;
+         ssl_certificate_key /etc/nginx/ssl/key.pem;
+         ssl_session_timeout 1d;
+         ssl_session_cache shared:SSL:50m;
+         ssl_protocols TLSv1.2 TLSv1.3;
+         ssl_ciphers HIGH:!aNULL:!MD5;
+ 
+         # å‰ç«¯é™æ€æ–‡ä»¶
+         location / {
+             root /usr/share/nginx/html;
+             try_files $uri $uri/ /index.html;
+             
+             # ç¼“å­˜é™æ€èµ„æº
+             location ~* \.(js|css|png|jpg|jpeg|gif|ico|svg|woff|woff2|ttf|eot)$ {
+                 expires 30d;
+                 add_header Cache-Control "public, immutable";
+             }
+         }
+ 
+         # APIä»£ç†
+         location /api/ {
+             limit_req zone=api burst=20 nodelay;
+             limit_conn addr 10;
+ 
+             proxy_pass http://backend;
+             proxy_set_header Host $host;
+             proxy_set_header X-Real-IP $remote_addr;
+             proxy_set_header X-Forwarded-For $proxy_add_x_forwarded_for;
+             proxy_set_header X-Forwarded-Proto $scheme;
+             
+             proxy_connect_timeout 30s;
+             proxy_send_timeout 30s;
+             proxy_read_timeout 30s;
+             
+             proxy_buffering on;
+             proxy_buffer_size 8k;
+             proxy_buffers 8 8k;
+         }
+ 
+         # å¥åº·æ£€æŸ¥
+         location /health {
+             access_log off;
+             return 200 "OK";
+         }
+     }
+ }
+ ```

+ ### Day 3: CI/CDé…ç½® (8h)
+ 
+ #### ä»»åŠ¡19: è‡ªåŠ¨åŒ–éƒ¨ç½² (8h)
+ ```yaml
+ æ–‡ä»¶: .github/workflows/deploy.yml
+ 
+ name: Deploy to Production
+ 
+ on:
+   push:
+     branches: [ main ]
+ 
+ jobs:
+   build:
+     runs-on: ubuntu-latest
+ 
+     steps:
+     - uses: actions/checkout@v3
+ 
+     - name: Setup Node.js
+       uses: actions/setup-node@v3
+       with:
+         node-version: '18'
+ 
+     - name: Install dependencies
+       run: pnpm install
+ 
+     - name: Run tests
+       run: pnpm test
+ 
+     - name: Build
+       run: pnpm build
+ 
+     - name: Build Docker image
+       run: docker build -t xsread:${{ github.sha }} .
+ 
+     - name: Push to registry
+       run: |
+         echo ${{ secrets.DOCKER_PASSWORD }} | docker login -u ${{ secrets.DOCKER_USERNAME }} --password-stdin
+         docker tag xsread:${{ github.sha }} ${{ secrets.DOCKER_REGISTRY }}/xsread:latest
+         docker push ${{ secrets.DOCKER_REGISTRY }}/xsread:latest
+ 
+     - name: Deploy to server
+       uses: appleboy/ssh-action@master
+       with:
+         host: ${{ secrets.SERVER_HOST }}
+         username: ${{ secrets.SERVER_USER }}
+         key: ${{ secrets.SSH_PRIVATE_KEY }}
+         script: |
+           cd /data/xsread
+           docker-compose pull
+           docker-compose up -d
+           docker image prune -f
+ ```
+ 
+ ```bash
+ æ–‡ä»¶: deploy.sh
+ 
+ #!/bin/bash
+ 
+ echo "å¼€å§‹éƒ¨ç½²..."
+ 
+ # 1. å¤‡ä»½æ•°æ®åº“
